help.title: Support module help
help.description:
`support` 
Get the info 
`support set <Role> <Chat>` 
Add a new support chat! 
`support set` 
Remove a support chat

set.usage: Wrong usage of `set`. Use `module SupportModule` to see the help!

info.null: You do not have setup this!

commands.usage: Wrong usage. Use `module SupportModule` to see the help!
